title: Best Fonts of 2008
content:
I’m surprised no one has mentioned the new typographica?

Spending time on other websites is ok you know.

[http://new.typographica.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090427162257/http:/new.typographica.org/ "http://new.typographica.org/")
author: Höfe

comments.content: I was there earlier for a spell.
Aesthetics and usefulness aside, the typeface that defined 2008 for me was [Palin Dudes](http://web.archive.org/web/20090427162257/http:/slog.thestranger.com/2008/10/the_return_of_the_palin_dudes).
